Sentencas: The paper studies oxidation resistance and electrical conductivity of dense coatings produced by vacuum-arc deposition technique on alpha-titanium thin (0.1 mm) substrate using a hot pressed Ti2AlC-TiC target.
Titulo: Development of oxidation-resistant and electrically conductive coating of Ti-Al-C system for the lightweight interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The coatings were deposited at low (7 mA/cm2) and high (15 mA/cm2) current densities on the substrate and marked LCD and HCD, respectively.
Titulo: Development of oxidation-resistant and electrically conductive coating of Ti-Al-C system for the lightweight interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This provided different local chemical and phase compositions of the coatings.
Titulo: Development of oxidation-resistant and electrically conductive coating of Ti-Al-C system for the lightweight interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that phase compositions of the coatings differ from that of the target.
Titulo: Development of oxidation-resistant and electrically conductive coating of Ti-Al-C system for the lightweight interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The HCD coating has high oxidation resistance evaluated in terms of the specific weight gain (Delta m/S = 0.06 mg/cm2) as well as high surface electrical conductivity (sigma = 1.23 & sdot;106 S/m) after long-term (1000 h) holding at 600 degrees C in the air due to the formation of an over thin (450 nm) Ti-Al-(C, O, N) near-surface layer.
Titulo: Development of oxidation-resistant and electrically conductive coating of Ti-Al-C system for the lightweight interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thin titanium substrate with such Ti-Al-C coating is recommended as a lightweight interconnect of an intermediatetemperature solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Development of oxidation-resistant and electrically conductive coating of Ti-Al-C system for the lightweight interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells
